show.subtitle: Psychiatrist Peter R. Breggin, MD believes you can make a marvelous life.  Great guests, callers and conversations to inspire you.
show.title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour

title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour
content:
My guest Gayle Rozantine, PhD exemplies and lives what it means to be a therapist.  Working with returning combat... <!--more--> soldiers and their families, she describes the impact of war on everyone who is touched by it, and devotes herself to providing thoughtful, caring, and innovative services.  Meet Gayle and learn about many frontier empathic therapies at our upcoming conference April 26-28, 2013 in Syracuse NY–www.empathictherapy.
org.
